title: What pushes one to insanity? Is insanity curable? - Quora

response.answer_text: That’s like asking what causes disease, is disease curable. Insanity covers such an enormous range of things - some legitimately insanity, some just called that in popular culture - and the answer to “Is it curable?” covers everything from “never” to “always”, passing through “Depends on the circumstances”. In short, there’s no answer shorter than a novel, to this question as worded.
